name: Worse together
description:
Made in 48 hours for the gmtk game jam!

Worse together is a game where two people control the same character, one moving the character right, and making the character crouch when needed, and the other making the character move left, and making the player jump. Both of these people need to work together in order to be successful in the game!

The theme for the jam was Joined Together, and I think it's pretty clear how this fits the theme, but if you don't get it, both of the players are Joined Together into one!

Controls:

Player 1: Right arrow key to move, down arrow key to crouch

Player 2: Left D-pad/Joystick to move, A button to jump (or W and A keys, if you don't have a controller
